title: White Bean Chicken Chili
directions: Heat oil in Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add chicken to pan and season with pepper and salt if desired. Saute approximately 5 minutes.
Add onion, garlic, cumin, oregano and dried red pepper. Saute 5 minutes.
Add beans, broth, chilies and sour cream to chicken. Simmer until chicken is tender and cooked through, about 10 minutes. Ladle chili into bowls. Top with cheese and sprinkle with cilantro.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces Save
2 cans (19 ounce ea) cannellini beans (white kidney beans) - drained
2 cans (4 ounce ea) diced green chilies
